definitions.definition: A non- SI unit of energy , equivalent to 4.184 kilojoules , that can raise the temperature of a kilogram of water by one degree Celsius . This is the unit normally used in food labeling.
A non- SI unit of energy , equivalent to 4.184 joules , that can raise the temperature of a gram of water by one degree Celsius . This unit was formerly widely used in chemistry and physics .

main_definition: ( nutrition ) A non- SI unit of energy , equivalent to 4.184 kilojoules , that can raise the temperature of a kilogram of water by one degree Celsius . This is the unit normally used in food labeling.
secondary_definitions: ( physical chemistry , physics ) A non- SI unit of energy , equivalent to 4.184 joules , that can raise the temperature of a gram of water by one degree Celsius . This unit was formerly widely used in chemistry and physics .
